Structs/CloudCoreConfig.html#/s:9CloudCo.name: zoneID
Structs/CloudCoreConfig.html#/s:9CloudCo.abstract: RecordZone inside private database to store CoreData.

Structs/CloudCoreConfig.html#/s:9CloudCo.name: defaultAttributeNameRecordID
Structs/CloudCoreConfig.html#/s:9CloudCo.abstract: Default entity’s attribute name for Record ID if User Info is not specified.

Structs/CloudCoreConfig.html#/s:9CloudCo.name: defaultAttributeNameRecordData
Structs/CloudCoreConfig.html#/s:9CloudCo.abstract: Default entity’s attribute name for Record Data if User Info is not specified

Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html#/s:9Clo.name: willSyncFromCloud()
Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html#/s:9Clo.abstract: Tells the delegate that fetching data from CloudKit is about to begin

Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html#/s:9Clo.name: didSyncFromCloud()
Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html#/s:9Clo.abstract: Tells the delegate that data fetching from CloudKit and updating local objects processes are now completed

Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html#/s:9Clo.name: willSyncToCloud()
Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html#/s:9Clo.abstract: Tells the delegate that conversion operations (NSManagedObject to CKRecord) and data uploading to CloudKit is about to begin

Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html#/s:9Clo.name: didSyncToCloud()
Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html#/s:9Clo.abstract: Tells the delegate that data has been uploaded to CloudKit

Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html#/s:9Clo.name: error(error:module:)
Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html#/s:9Clo.abstract: Tells the delegate that error has been occured, maybe called multiple times

Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html.name: CloudCoreDelegate
Protocols/CloudCoreDelegate.html.abstract: Delegate for framework that can be used for proccesses tracking and error handling.

Enums/CloudCoreError.html#/s:9CloudCore0.name: custom
Enums/CloudCoreError.html#/s:9CloudCore0.abstract: Custom error, description is placed inside associated value

Enums/FetchResult.html#/s:9CloudCore11Fe.name: newData
Enums/FetchResult.html#/s:9CloudCore11Fe.abstract: Fetching has successfully completed without any errors

Enums/FetchResult.html#/s:9CloudCore11Fe.name: noData
Enums/FetchResult.html#/s:9CloudCore11Fe.abstract: No fetching was done, maybe fired with FetchAndSaveOperation was called with incorrect UserInfo without CloudCore’s data

Enums/Module.html.name: Module
Enums/Module.html.abstract: Enumeration with module name that issued an error in CloudCoreErrorDelegate

Enums/CloudCoreError.html.name: CloudCoreError
Enums/CloudCoreError.html.abstract: A enumeration representing an error value that can be thrown by framework

Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC6.name: config
Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC6.abstract: CloudCore configuration, it’s recommended to set up before calling any of CloudCore methods. You can read more at CloudCoreConfig struct description

Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC6.name: tokens
Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC6.abstract: Tokens object, read more at class description. By default variable is loaded from User Defaults.

Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC8.name: delegate
Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC8.abstract: Error and sync actions are reported to that delegate

Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC7.name: disable()
Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC7.abstract: Disables synchronization (push notifications won’t be sent also)

Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC1.name: fetchAndSave(using:to:error:completion:)
Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC1.abstract: Fetch changes from one CloudKit database and save it to CoreData from didReceiveRemoteNotification method.

Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC1.name: fetchAndSave(to:error:completion:)
Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC1.abstract: Fetch changes from all CloudKit databases and save it to Core Data

Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC0.name: isCloudCoreNotification(withUserInfo:)
Classes/CloudCore.html#/s:9CloudCoreAAC0.abstract: Check if notification is CloudKit notification containing CloudCore data

Classes/Tokens.html#/c:@M@CloudCore@objc.name: init()
Classes/Tokens.html#/c:@M@CloudCore@objc.abstract: Create fresh object without any Tokens inside. Can be used to fetch full data.

Classes/Tokens.html#/s:9CloudCore6Tokens.name: loadFromUserDefaults()
Classes/Tokens.html#/s:9CloudCore6Tokens.abstract: Load saved Tokens from UserDefaults. Key is used from CloudCoreConfig.userDefaultsKeyTokens

Classes/Tokens.html#/s:9CloudCore6Tokens.name: saveToUserDefaults()
Classes/Tokens.html#/s:9CloudCore6Tokens.abstract: Save tokens to UserDefaults and synchronize. Key is used from CloudCoreConfig.userDefaultsKeyTokens

Classes/Tokens.html#/c:@M@CloudCore@objc.name: init(coder:)
Classes/Tokens.html#/c:@M@CloudCore@objc.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/Tokens.html#/c:@M@CloudCore@objc.name: encode(with:)
Classes/Tokens.html#/c:@M@CloudCore@objc.abstract: Encodes the receiver using a given archiver.

Classes/FetchAndSaveOperation.html#/s:9C.name: allDatabases
Classes/FetchAndSaveOperation.html#/s:9C.abstract: Private cloud database for the CKContainer specified by CloudCoreConfig

Classes/FetchAndSaveOperation.html.name: FetchAndSaveOperation
Classes/FetchAndSaveOperation.html.abstract: An operation that fetches data from CloudKit and saves it to Core Data, you can use it without calling CloudCore.fetchAndSave methods if you application relies on Operation

Classes/Tokens.html.name: Tokens
Classes/Tokens.html.abstract: CloudCore’s class for storing global CKToken objects. Framework uses one to upload or download only changed data (smart-sync).

Classes/CloudCore.html.name: CloudCore
Classes/CloudCore.html.abstract: Main framework class, in most cases you will use only methods from this class, all methods and properties are static.
